QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Connect to NTRIP server using specified address/port
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripServerConnectEnabled

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: NTRIP Mount Point. Leave blank for RTCM over TCP
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripMountpoint

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: RTCM Messages to send over mavlink. Leave blank for all messages
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripWhitelist

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: If enabled, connect with TLS (2102) and treat payload as SPARTN instead of RTCM. Requires SPARTN keys handled by the receiver.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripUseSpartn
